message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 5-5-4, translated into all languages

data.en: This indicator reflects the global target “5.5.1: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments”
data.vi: Chỉ tiêu này phản ánh chỉ tiêu toàn cầu “5.5.1: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments”
